name: Legend Peashooter
description:
This game takes about 48h to make but I rest at most of the time.

please say: #boo2Bozelles because just trust me, just do it.

Behind the scenes coming soon!...

Controls:
  • Press W or D or using the Analog sticks (PlayStations) or D-PAD(standard Xboxes)  to move the Peashooter.
  • Press Space or O(PlayStations) or X(standard Xboxes)  on the Joystick to shoot.
  •  Try your best and kill All the Zombies!!!
